restartInfo: Some changes come into effect after restarting the game.
charsetInfo: If you change from a language using the Latin, Cyrillic or Greek script to a language not using any of those and you haven't explicitly enabled the extended character set beforehand, you have to restart the game to apply these changes.
hoverInfo: Hover over a button with your mouse to have it explained in detail to you.
deletionConfirm: Are you sure you want to irrecovably delete {0}?
giveName: Give your new savegame a short and recognizable filename.
strawberrySeedsDescription: An easy and inexpensive way to start with farming.
shovelDescription: Simple but robust shovel that can turn grass to farmland.
wateringCanDescription: Small watering can that can't hold a whole lot of water
bigWateringCanDescription: Can hold way more water than the small variant.
